1137140.name: Roll+Heart Demo
1137140.description:
Roll+Heart is a dating simulation and visual novel set within the adventures of a tabletop game group. The game includes tabletop battles, a thrilling campaign and a variety of exciting date opportunities. During this demo you can experience the first tabletop session and go on first dates.

With diverse character customization and five unique romantic paths to take, Roll+Heart explores the lines between roleplay and reality, and celebrates the appeal of tabletop games to people from all walks of life - from a car mechanic to a mother of two.



A tabletop dating sim about romance, friendship, secrets, and the ultimate fantasy - a group who can consistently play tabletop every week!
Will you slay dragons? Loot dungeons? Win the hand of your one true love? Roll+Heart, and find out!
